title: Pedagogical and Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory and foundational understanding of language education
context.additional_context: Designed around analyzing correlations between pedagogical competencies and language proficiency in self-directed learning environments utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain pedagogical competencies (lesson design, assessment methods, learner management) with over 80% accuracy.
Preservice teachers can apply advanced language expressions (explanations, feedback, questioning techniques) suitable for academic contexts in actual class simulations with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can statistically explain the relationship between pedagogical competencies and language proficiency using correlation analysis techniques.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
